var da_ptr=0
var a_ptr=0
var b_ptr=0
var fr=-30
?fr<0
 ?fr=-29
    play ui_starold2
 :?fr=-28
    play frog
 :?fr=27
    play hammer_hit
 ambient.Stop()
 music.Stop()

?fr=b[b_ptr][0]
    play ui_starold2 @b[b_ptr][1]@
    ?b_ptr<661
        b_ptr=b_ptr+1
?fr=da[da_ptr]
 play hammer_hit 115
 ?da_ptr<89
  da_ptr=da_ptr+1
?fr=a[a_ptr][0]
    play frog @a[a_ptr][1]@
    ?a_ptr<194
     a_ptr=a_ptr+1
?fr<6500
 fr++
:
 fr=0
 da_ptr=0
 a_ptr=0
 b_ptr=0
